name: Rabbit in Ruins
description:
you are a rabbit in an abandoned sports stadium, the back maintenance halls are covered in fencing and concrete. this is no place to live.

a short game slice created for the objective media jam, possibly to be expanded on in the future.

If you have issues running the game through the HTML5 version, please try a download below (unzips to 30MB).

controls:

left and right arrow keys - move left and right

enter door - up arrow key

z - jump

r - reset to checkpoint

y - reset level

m - toggle mute

everything here is by me, pizzie!
